FrageText.de: Welche Fahrzeuge, außer Zugmaschinen, dürfen Sie noch überholen?
FrageText.en: What vehicles, aside from towing vehicles, are you also permitted to overtake?
FrageText.hr: Koja vozila osim traktora smijete još pretjecati?
FrageText.sl: Katera vozila, razen traktorjev, smete še prehiteti?
FrageText.tr: Traktörler dışında başka hangi araçları sollayabilirsiniz?

de.Text: Ich darf auch einspurige Fahrzeuge überholen

en.Text: I am also permitted to overtake single-track vehicles
I am also permitted to overtake wagons
I am also permitted to overtake trucks

hr.Text: Smijem pretjecati i vozila s jednim tragom

sl.Text: Prehiteti smem tudi tovorna motorna vozila
